name: US Army Commando Training 3D - Military Academy
name_original: US Army Commando Training 3D - Military Academy
description:
US Army Commando Training 3D - Military Academy is top training game where the military commanders will show their climbing training and ninja training to counter mafia crime. Soldier survival missions are interesting fighting training where they will exhibit their free military games skills. The training schedule of military and army man is to show that cadet and army soldier will be surviving through mafia, enemy and underworld attack with bravery. US Army Commando Training 3D - Military Academy is not a repetitive shooting game where you just shoot and go. It is a great chance to save commando squad and army man at military base camp from ISIS terrorists and rogue elements.

This is a type of army sniper shooting games where army sniper shooter has to save the military arsenal from terrorists during counter terrorist operation. Commando counter is the mission of illegal spy who attacks the sergeant on duty. You have much ammunition and bullets at your discretion. US Army Commando Training 3D - Military Academy is a sacred mission not personal vendetta. Combat training is the essential part of this shooting adventure to kill the terrorist and save jail and military barrack in the wild jungle.

We provide family games with responsibility that extreme care is taken to maintain quality of the family games according to safety and security laws. We always welcome feedback and comments from our valued free simulation game players. So you are requested to please comment so that we can make our games better for our valuable players.
Please remain intact for updates. You can expect more interesting free simulation games from us.
